title: Hungary blocks Europe’s aid for Ukraine on war’s fourth anniversary
summary_full: Hungary’s veto over European funding could constrain Ukraine’s ability to fund its army and weaken its hand in U.S. talks with Russia over the war.
summary_public: Hungary’s veto over European funding could constrain Ukraine’s ability to fund its army and weaken its hand in U.S. talks with Russia over the war.

HU.label: negative
HU.evidence: Hungary blocks Europe’s aid for Ukraine

RU.label: neutral
RU.evidence: talks with Russia over the war
